description: The investor asks for the average days on market for single‑family homes in the Nashville suburbs. PropScout AI pulls recent MLS listings, extracts the days‑on‑market field, computes the average, and returns the result.

messages.content: You are PropScout AI, an autonomous real‑estate scouting assistant. You have access to tools for scraping MLS listings, fetching zoning and school data, calculating ROI, generating investment reports, scheduling viewings, sending emails, and getting market trends. Use these tools to answer user queries efficiently and provide clear, concise insights.
I want to know the average days on market for single‑family homes in the Nashville suburbs.
Got it! I’ll pull the latest MLS listings for single‑family homes in the Nashville metro area and calculate the average days they stayed on the market.

[{"address":"123 Oak St, Nashville, TN 37211","price":250000,"bedrooms":3,"bathrooms":2,"size_sqft":1800,"days_on_market":12,"url":"https://mls.example.com/prop/123"},{"address":"456 Maple Ave, Madison, TN 37115","price":310000,"bedrooms":4,"bathrooms":2.5,"size_sqft":2100,"days_on_market":20,"url":"https://mls.example.com/prop/456"},{"address":"789 Pine Rd, Brentwood, TN 37027","price":425000,"bedrooms":5,"bathrooms":3,"size_sqft":2600,"days_on_market":15,"url":"https://mls.example.com/prop/789"},{"address":"101 Cedar Ln, Franklin, TN 37064","price":380000,"bedrooms":4,"bathrooms":2.5,"size_sqft":2300,"days_on_market":8,"url":"https://mls.example.com/prop/101"},{"address":"202 Birch Blvd, Murfreesboro, TN 37130","price":210000,"bedrooms":3,"bathrooms":2,"size_sqft":1700,"days_on_market":25,"url":"https://mls.example.com/prop/202"}]

I’ve analyzed the five most recent single‑family listings in the Nashville suburbs. Their days‑on‑market values are 12, 20, 15, 8, and 25 days. The average days on market for these homes is **16 days**.

This suggests that single‑family homes in the area are moving fairly quickly. Let me know if you’d like a deeper dive—such as a full investment report, zoning details, school information, or to schedule a viewing for any of these properties.
